<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o expseg.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 ; p4 = frequency in pitch-class notation. kcps = cpspch(p4)
; Create an amplitude envelope. kenv expseg 0.01, p3*0.25, 1, p3*0.75, 0.01 kamp = kenv * 30000
a1 oscil kamp, kcps, 1 out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Table #1, a sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
; Play Instrument #1 for a half-second, p4=8.00 i 1 0 0.5 8.00 ; Play Instrument #1 for a half-second, p4=8.01 i 1 1 0.5 8.01 ; Play Instrument #1 for a half-second, p4=8.02 i 1 2 0.5 8.02 ; Play Instrument #1 for a half-second, p4=8.03 i 1 3 0.5 8.03 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
